doc.title: Updating files in the Working copy

section.p:
Update brings changes from the repository into your working copy.
Following an update your working copy will be up-to-date with the HEAD (latest) revision in the repository.
How to update a working copy:
1. Select the item(s) you want to update from Solution Explorer.
2. Right click the selected item. A menu will pop up. By selecting a solution/project update will be done recursively on all files under the selected item.
3. Select Update from the items menu.
Ankhs output window will show all the files that has been updated.
